gui.familiar_friends.author: Author(s):
cooldown.familiar_friends.cooldown: You must wait %s more %s before you can perform this action!
cooldown.familiar_friends.lowstat: Cannot Perform this action! Your %s is too low!
entity.familiar_friends.chicken_companio: Grants the Player passive slow falling while the player is on the ground, which lasts for 2 seconds when in the air.
entity.familiar_friends.iron_golem_compa: Damages hostile mobs and sends them flying into the air (causing additional fall damage).
When equipped, Items are able to be picked up from farther away!
entity.familiar_friends.ocelot_companion: Grants the player passive Swiftness. You can also press "%s" to Meow.
entity.familiar_friends.skeleton_compani: Shoots arrows at nearby Hostile Creatures!
entity.familiar_friends.spider_companion: Allows the user to climb up any wall! It also allows one to slide down walls.
entity.familiar_friends.navi_companion.d: When the Player approaches a vein of Ancient Debris or Diamond Ore, Navi will alert the player. They will increase their pitch the closer the player gets to the vein.
entity.familiar_friends.one_up_mushroom_: If the player is supposed to die, their health will be fully restored. If the 1-Up Mushroom is used it will need to be unlocked again!
entity.familiar_friends.companion_cube_c: Grants the Player the ability to walk on non-flowing Lava!
Will Smite the direction you look when pressing "%s"! There is a 20 second cooldown before lightning can be struck again.
entity.familiar_friends.herobrine_compan: Will Teleport the player in the direction they are looking when pressing "%s", but will consume player health. More health is consumed the further the teleport is, but it will kill the player. Teleports don't work when player health is too low, and they have a 15 second cooldown.
